meanings.definition: To surpass in skill or ability.
meanings.sent1: She outmans her classmates in math.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outmans his opponents in chess.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel outmans the big squirrel in finding nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outmans her fears is inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The superhero outmans the villain with his quick thinking.

meanings.definition: To defeat or outdo in a competition or contest.
meanings.sent1: The team outmans their rivals in the final match.
meanings.sent2: She outmans her brother in the game of basketball.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox outmans the hunter in a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: His strategy to outmans his opponents is impressive.
meanings.sent5: The underdog outmans the champion in a surprising turn of events.
